statements.select: select * from Room WITH(NOLOCK) order by HotelID
select * from Room WITH(NOLOCK) Where HotelID = @HotelID

Select * From PriceRate WITH(NOLOCK) Where BaseRoomID = @BaseRoomID And Night = @Night And CanSell = 1 And PayType = '预付' And Breakfast <> '无早' and Breakfast <> '单早' And [TimeStamp] > CONVERT(varchar(100), getdate(), 23) Order By Price

select pr.*,rm.HotelID,rm.Name Name2,rm.BedType BedType2,rm.Area,Convert(int,pr.price) SumPrice from PriceRate pr WITH(NOLOCK) inner join Room rm WITH(NOLOCK) on pr.BaseRoomID = rm.BaseRoomID where rm.HotelID = @HotelID and pr.Night >= @CheckIn and pr.Night < @CheckOut And CanSell = 1 --And pr.[TimeStamp] > CONVERT(varchar(100), getdate(), 23) order by BaseRoomID,RoomID

select distinct convert(bigint,0) ID,Night from PriceRate pr WITH(NOLOCK) inner join Room rm WITH(NOLOCK) on rm.BaseRoomID = pr.BaseRoomID where rm.HotelID = @HotelID And pr.CanSell = 1 --And pr.[TimeStamp] > CONVERT(varchar(100), getdate(), 23) order by Night

select distinct convert(bigint,0) ID,Night from PriceRate pr WITH(NOLOCK) inner join Room rm WITH(NOLOCK) on rm.BaseRoomID = pr.BaseRoomID where rm.HotelID = @HotelID And pr.CanSell = 1 and pr.PayType = '预付' --And pr.[TimeStamp] > CONVERT(varchar(100), getdate(), 23) order by Night

select distinct pr.ID,pr.Night from PriceRate pr WITH(NOLOCK) inner join Room rm WITH(NOLOCK) on rm.BaseRoomID = pr.BaseRoomID where rm.HotelID = @HotelID And pr.CanSell = 1 --And pr.[TimeStamp] > CONVERT(varchar(100), getdate(), 23) And pr.ID = @PID order by Night
select top 1 RealHotelID from CtripDB.dbo.HotelBase where HotelID = @HotelOriID
